description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 4/25/2006

Coming out of the fog, and the lovemaking Brooke is shocked to see Ridge in her bed. Although Ridge seems happy, Brooke then reveals that she had taken too many anxiety pills and that she didn’t want this to happen. Ridge feels horrible; he never meant to hurt Brooke.  Stephanie tells Bridget that Dino belongs at home with Felicia. Brooke learns that Jackie is out of jail and is thrilled but is hesitant to tell Nick about what happened with Ridge.
